title: Legal Notice
subtitle: Legal information and transparency: our commitment to compliant and responsible service.

coming_soon.title: Complete legal notice available soon
coming_soon.description: Detailed legal notices will be published with the official launch of the GoldWen application. They will include all legal information required by French and European regulations.

gdpr_compliance.title: GDPR compliance
gdpr_compliance.description: Full compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation.

french_law.title: French law
french_law.description: Application compliant with French law and applicable regulations.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear information about the publisher, hosting, and responsibilities.

user_protection.title: User protection
user_protection.description: Respect for user rights and legal obligations.

contact.title: Legal questions?
contact.description: For any questions regarding the legal aspects of GoldWen, contact our legal team.
